Title: Children of Earth, Day Two
Plot: Torchwood are forced underground, as the government takes swift and brutal action.  With members of the team being hunted down, only Lois holds the key to Torchwood's salvation - but she is helpless as her superiors make plans for the mysterious Floor 13.
GuestStars: Kai Owen, Peter Capaldi, Paul Copley, Nicholas Farrell, Susan Brown, Lucy Cohu, Cush Jumbo, Liz May Brice, Ian Gelder, Colin McFarlane, Deborah Findlay, Nicholas Briggs, Patric Naiambana, Tom Price, Charles Abomeli
